caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. WILLARD ALLEN.

opinion.posture: In re Allen, Willard; â€” Defendant(s); applying for writ of certiorari and/or review, supervisory and/or remedial writs; Parish of Natchitoches, 10th Judicial District Court, Div. "B", No. 93-6303; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. KW94-01246.
opinion.opinion_text:
Denied.
WATSON, J., concurs but notes that the trial judge probably erred by appointing the investigator; the selection should be made by defense counsel.
DENNIS, J., not on panel.West Page 167
